Text: Thanks to this stupid magazine, the world seems to suck even more than I used to believe. Oh well - fuck it.

"Thanks to this stupid magazine, the world seems to suck even more than I used to believe. Oh well - fuck it."

Am I missing some sneaky sarcasm, or is this in fact the stupidest post i have ever seen?
Sarcasm. I love this "stupid magazine"! The world though is certainly a trying affair.
Always has been - May you live in interesting times.

The Economist is published by a corporate subsidiary of the Rothschild global central banking empire (Pearson plc).  In other words, the same clowns who are bringing down all the world's national economies through debt, uncontrolled deficit spending, and inflation via the central banking systems of the world.  

The Economist is such expertly crafted propaganda that it would make even Joseph Goebbels blush.

Thanks, man. I really needed a good laugh today. I'm chortling so hard i can hardly type. Do you know any other good ones?
